replies.body: We ask that players interested in singing up for the PBE have a good standing on their account.  DTN provided some great information here, and also have a [PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq) that might also help.  We can't expedite or guarantee PBE admission, but I wish you the best of luck!

I'm unsure if there is a level requirement, but you can sign up for the PBE by going to your profile on the top right, clicking PBE, then clicking the **"I Want to Help"** on bottom. In the links to the right from the page you sign up from you can find PBE FAQ, the status of your application, and the PBE boards (you must have a PBE account to post on them, but not read).

PBE invites are sent out about every 2 weeks with each cycle, but they only accept a small handful of players according to their needs. They may target individuals that play a certain role or champion they are testing, and having a punishment on your account will reduce your chance to be picked. It is random, so you may get it in the very next cycle, or never.
